title: Translating ProjectCatalyst
description: People cant build up multilingual resources if the innovation hub (ProjectCatalyst) itself doesn\`t reach them in their local language.
solution: ProjectCatalyst and the TownHall-Meetings even the proposals need to be translated, that everyone can take part and engage themself.
experience: Jonny and Alain alredy live-translate regularly the weekly TownHall Meetings. Jonny is also an an active translator in the Cardano-Forum.
